member.name: T:Plugin.SecureStorage.WinSecureStorageBase
member.summary: Base class for handling in memory operation for windows platform The derived classes must take care of persisting the information

member.name: F:Plugin.SecureStorage.WinSecureStorageBase.StorageFile
member.summary: Name of the storage file.

member.name: F:Plugin.SecureStorage.WinSecureStorageBase.StoragePassword
member.summary: Password for storage. Must be set prior to usage in Android and Windows

member.name: M:Plugin.SecureStorage.WinSecureStorageBase.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor, validates settings, loads the store

member.name: M:Plugin.SecureStorage.WinSecureStorageBase.GetValue(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the value from storage. If value with the given key does not exist, returns default value

member.name: M:Plugin.SecureStorage.WinSecureStorageBase.SetValue(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the value for the given key. If value exists, overwrites it Else creates new entry. Does not accept null value.

member.name: M:Plugin.SecureStorage.WinSecureStorageBase.DeleteKey(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes the key and corresponding value from the storage
member.returns: true, if key was deleted, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Plugin.SecureStorage.WinSecureStorageBase.HasKey(System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether specified key exists in the storage
member.returns: true if this instance has key the specified key; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Plugin.SecureStorage.WinSecureStorageBase.LoadFromStorage
member.summary: Loads the dictionary from storge

member.name: M:Plugin.SecureStorage.WinSecureStorageBase.SaveToStorage
member.summary: method to encrypt and save dictionary to storage

member.name: M:Plugin.SecureStorage.WinSecureStorageBase.LoadData
member.summary: Derived classes must implement this method. Derived class will read the data from the storage, decrypt it and return clear data.

member.name: M:Plugin.SecureStorage.WinSecureStorageBase.SaveData(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Derived classes must implement this method. Derived class will encrypt the data and save it.

member.name: F:Plugin.SecureStorage.WinSecureStorageBase.StoragePasswordArray
member.summary: array corresponding to the password

member.name: F:Plugin.SecureStorage.WinSecureStorageBase._store
member.summary: dictionary to store values

member.name: T:Plugin.SecureStorage.CrossSecureStorage
member.summary: Cross platform SecureStorage implemenations

member.name: P:Plugin.SecureStorage.CrossSecureStorage.Current
member.summary: Current settings to use

member.name: T:Plugin.SecureStorage.SecureStorageImplementation
member.summary: Implementation of persistence for WinPhone 8.1 Same is applicable for UWP

member.name: M:Plugin.SecureStorage.SecureStorageImplementation.LoadData
member.summary: Implementation of Load from storage for Windows Store, WP8.1 and UWP.

member.name: M:Plugin.SecureStorage.SecureStorageImplementation.SaveData(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Synchronous implementation of Save to storage for Windows Store and windows phone 8.1 and UWP Calls async method and makes it run synchronously

member.name: M:Plugin.SecureStorage.SecureStorageImplementation.LoadDataAsync
member.summary: Implementation of Load from storage for Windows Store.

member.name: M:Plugin.SecureStorage.SecureStorageImplementation.SaveDataAsync(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Implementation of Save to storage for Windows Store, WP8.1 and UWP
